title: About me
text:
I only believe in information that is backed by concrete research evidence and sound journalism.
If someone tells me about a research fact, I will check Google Scholar for the research paper, and check the references of the research paper until I read the original report.
Having an older sister residing in the States, I’ve been introduced to the Americans’ athletic sense as well as their embrace of diversity and inclusion.
After living in the heart of Europe for more than 1 year, I have become very mindful of my consumption habits as they impact the environment, and I am now a minimalist.
My greatest achievement so far: I have a healthy and strong relationship with my family members.

title: Trieu Le
text:
I am doing a Master’s in International Business Economics and Management at KU Leuven, Belgium.
Formerly, I had a Marketing job offer in the Finance sector in Vietnam but decided to decline it and pursue a Master in Belgium.
The number one skill that I want to learn at the moment is communicating effectively with people: being to-the-point, specific, understandable, concise and articulate without “and”, uhm” or “ah”.
For me, every encounter is a chance to share and to learn.
Feel free to be in touch! Thanks for stopping by.

title: Work experience
text:
My goal is to get exposed to as many technical and business roles as possible.
